message.content:
cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.RO 

The paper presents a novel hierarchical graphical model for a context-aware hybrid brain-machine interface (hBMI) using probabilistic fusion of EEG and EMG activities. The paper involves machine learning techniques for classification and simulation, which suggests that it could belong to the sub-categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also involves human-computer interaction (HCI) and robotics, which suggests that it could belong to the sub-categories of cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) and cs.RO (Robotics).
